label: 187. Medical Account of Gerhard Muller, MD, for Heyward slaves -- June 6, 1863
description: Itemized account of Gerhard Muller, MD, from May to December, 1862, outlining the specific medical care, with costs, of the slaves of James B. Heyward and William Henry Heyward.  2p. Issued June 6, 1863.

metadata.label: Description
metadata.value: Itemized account of Gerhard Muller, MD, from May to December, 1862, outlining the specific medical care, with costs, of the slaves of James B. Heyward and William Henry Heyward.  2p. Issued June 6, 1863.
